attributes.action: Require full ingredient and nutritional information on all menus
attributes.additional_details:
Currently large businesses with 250 or more employees in England are required to display calorie information on menus. We want this to be extended to require all food businesses to display full ingredient and nutritional information on menus.
 
This could be good for people who are on a diet and who don't want to ask as some people find this embarrassing, and some places may not even know.
attributes.background: I want full ingredient and nutritional information - including calories, fat, sugar and salt - to be required on any type of menu, including all pubs, restaurants, takeaway and any other food establishment. This also includes online businesses such as Deliveroo, Just Eat and Uber Eats.
